title: The Large Scale Water Supply and Sewerage Projects implemented by 	the National Water Supply and Drainage Board
decision_details:
- The Proposal made by the Minister of Water Supply to treat the following large 	scale projects implemented by the National Water Supply and Drainage Board	as special projects so as to exempt such projects from being charged taxes	under 	the relevant tax laws and accordingly to provide facilities for such	projects, was approved by the Cabinet.

*	Hemmathagama Water Supply Project

*	Ruwanwella Water Supply Project

*	Jaffna and Kilinochchi Water Supply Project

*	Rathmalana/ Moratuwa Wastewater Disposal Project

*	Kalu Gang Water Supply Expansion Project
